data.text: @Etawah_UP75 @kshal07 @ANI when we compare infrastructure with developed nations like US then we should also compare covid management and vaccine development with them. People just pick and choose things which suit their agenda

@Etawah_UP75 @Kunsh2006 @ANI Oxygen shortage was govt. mistake, the did hv time bet. 1 & 2 waves. Only after so many deaths , they set up 100s of oxy. plants. We comp. with US bcoz they've most well equipped health infra.
@ANI Like, how can someone lie out so loud in public. @narendramodi U r special...🙏😟

@kshal07 @Kunsh2006 @ANI Yes I agree but what about the failure of the govt. Why no one talks about that.. everyone saw how the shortage of oxygen takes the lives of thousands of people in our country ..... Each times when this topic comes we only compared us with US.
@Etawah_UP75 @Kunsh2006 Lol, no. You are putting your opinions on social media, it will be countered.

@Etawah_UP75 @Kunsh2006 @ANI The Modi govt. figures may not be correct. But non BJP states also released data and they were relatively less compared to US, Europe. With relatively low resources we managed to vaccinate such a large no. pop.,  produce multiple good vaccines. That makes it commendable.
@ANI Due to mismanagement of Covid situation by BJP Govt lacs of people lost their lives and  here  the PM is patting himself on his back.
@ANI Itna darr hai isko protests se ki iske aane k baad saare black masks, black cloth, sab black colour ki cheeze entry pe remove karwa di â€¦ aur kis muh se ye sab bolta hai aake ye 🤣
